text: Muhammad Jalal-ud-din also known as Jalal Baba (1910-1981) was an activist and political leader of the All India Muslim League.Chohdry, AR 'Pakistani ki siyasi tareekh' (Urdu :Pakistan's Political History), Lahore, 1997 He was born in Abbottabad District in British India.Whos Who in Abbottabad, govt of NWFP, 1935, p 109 He was active from 1935 and 1936 onwards in the Pakistan Movement.Chohdry, aa The Jalal Baba Auditorium in Abbottabad city, now in Pakistan, is named after him. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1918 deaths Category:Leaders of All India Muslim League Category:Abbottabad District
title: Muhammad Jalal-ud-din
